div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1433 Osmaniye (anc. Epiphaneia ?), Cilicia, 1968 Burial: c. 145 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 300 AR Alexander III: c. 20 post. tetradr. Athens: c. 40 New Style tetradr. Cyme: c. 10 tetradr. Myrina: c. 20 tetradr. Smyrna: 2 tetradr. Cos: 1 tetradr. Antiochus IV: c. 30 tetradr. Antiochus V: 6 tetradr. Demetrius I: c. 150 tetradr. Alexander I Bala: c. 10 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed
